quotes.quote: Connection starves suspicion.
Connection gives purpose and meaning to our lives.
A hidden connection is stronger than an obvious one.
Understanding and connection can transcend conflict.
We hunger for connection but take pride in being distant.
Connection with yourself only comes in moments of silence.
More connections to more devices means more vulnerabilities.
Connections are made slowly, sometimes they grow underground.
No connection can ever be broken if love holds tight at both ends.
The only thing you can lose is ... your connection to who-you-are.
Human connections are deeply nurtured in the field of shared story.
Connection and connectedness are other words for community and communion.
The loss of a beloved connection awakens an interest in Heaven before unfelt.
The ultimate connection is when you are connected to the creator of the universe.
With our divine connection we are always in touch with the solutions we are seeking.
When people go within and connect with themselves, they realize they are connected to the universe and they are connected to all living things.
Only through our connectedness to others can we really know and enhance self. And only through working on the self can we begin to enhance our connectedness to others.
One must always maintain one's connection to the past and yet ceaselessly pull away from it.
Our connection with our intuitive self is ever present and always a part of ourselves.
Soul connections are not often found and are worth every bit of fight left in you to keep.
Mankind is connected in ways it does not understand - even in dreams.
Make connections; let rip; and dance where you can.
Frequently consider the connection of all things in the universe.
Bid for connection: Each of our daily interactions with another person.
Cherish your human connections - your relationships with friends and family.
Your connections with other people are important, our connection to the earth.
All is connected... no one thing can change by itself.
Connection and position lead to success.
